body.p:
Hospital of the Ky Penitentiary
Aug 6 1862
His Excellency
Gov B MaGoffin

This is to certify that Charles Tomlinson a convict in this institution sent from Scott County for manslaughter has been in delicate health during the time he has been in confinement and in view of that fact we recommend him as a fit subject for executive clemency

Scott Cir Ct
Chas H Tomlinson
6 ys. Penty
Manslaughter
Pardon Issd Aug 16 1861
